title: Famous Skyscrapers Quiz
description: How well do you know the world's most impressive skyscrapers? Test your recall of these towering achievements.

questions.question: As of 2024, which skyscraper holds the record as the tallest building in the world at 828 meters?
The Empire State Building, once the world's tallest building, is located in which city?
The Petronas Twin Towers, once the tallest buildings in the world, are located in which Asian capital?
Which Chicago skyscraper, formerly known as the Sears Tower, was the world's tallest from 1973 to 1998?
Taipei 101, named for its 101 floors, is a landmark skyscraper in which country?
The Chrysler Building, known for its Art Deco crown, is located in which borough of New York City?
One World Trade Center, also known as the Freedom Tower, stands at a symbolic height of how many feet?
The Shanghai Tower, China's tallest building, features what distinctive architectural element?
Which London skyscraper is nicknamed 'The Shard' due to its glass-covered pyramidal shape?
The Flatiron Building, known for its triangular shape, was built in which year?
Which Dubai skyscraper features a distinctive sail-shaped silhouette and stands on an artificial island?
The Transamerica Pyramid, with its distinctive pointed shape, is a landmark of which American city?
30 St Mary Axe, commonly known as 'The Gherkin', is a distinctive skyscraper in which city?
The Lotte World Tower, the tallest building in South Korea, is located in which city?
Which famous skyscraper in New York City was the world's tallest building for just 11 months before the Empire State Building surpassed it?
